thread.title: What’s behind the joint venture trend in real estate?
thread.title_full: What’s behind the joint venture trend in real estate?

author: Hank Long
title: What’s behind the joint venture trend in real estate?
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / News / What’s behind the joint venture trend in real estate? Bob Perry of CarVal Investors (left) shares his views Thursday on forming joint venture partnerships in commercial real estate projects with Matt Volpano (center) of IRET and John Gavin (right), principal for Sterling Bay. Staff photo: Bill Klotz What’s behind the joint venture trend in real estate? By: Hank Long Hank Long October 22, 2015 4:52 pm 0 Joint ventures are becoming more common for investors to gain an edge in prospective deals in the Twin Cities. User Name/E-mail: Password:
